articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: Alcohol can increase your cancer risk. What experts say about how much is too much - CBS News
articles.description: Many Americans are unaware of the connection between drinking and cancer risk, despite growing research that points to the negative health impacts of alcohol.
articles.content:
Despite growing research that points to the negative health impacts of alcohol, many Americans are unaware of the connection between drinking and cancer risk.
